name: Black and White the Platformer
description:
A cubic smile face that wants to make the boss tired of too much walking! Play the platforming obstacles and get to the boss!!! Complete the 3 levels, make the boss tired of walking, get to the exit and WIN!!! Music Used: Level 1: Streets of Rage V5 - Go Straight Level 2: Streets of Rage V5 - Go Straight Level 3: Pause Ahead Side A - 01 : Boss of Nova Boss Level: Undertale - Stronger Monsters

I do not own the music! it belongs to their owners.

The Winning Sound Effect Belongs to Nintendo.
